text: CHIR99021 is a chemical compound which acts as an inhibitor of the enzyme GSK-3. It has proved useful for applications in molecular biology involving the transformation of one cell type to another. A mixture of CHIR99021 and valproic acid is claimed to increase the proliferation of inner ear stem cells, potentially allowing regrowth of the hair cells which are important for hearing, and are lost through chronic exposure to loud noises or as part of the aging process. == See also == * SB-431542 == References == Category:Kinase inhibitors Category:Aminopyrimidines Category:Imidazoles Category:Nitriles Category:Chloroarenes
